wpsSetup.description: Choose a WPS from the list or add a custom WPS. Also, adjust the WPS version via the radio-button.
wpsSetup.chooseWps: Pleas choose a WPS from the list:

wpsAddServiceModal.title: Add a custom WPS service URL
wpsAddServiceModal.description: Please enter a valid endpoint URL starting with 'http:' or 'https:' pointing to a existing Web Processing Service
wpsAddServiceModal.alert_unvalidUrl: The entered URL was not valid. Please check your URL (e.g. no whitespaces are allowed).
wpsAddServiceModal.success_text: The URL has been added to the list of available services.
